comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi ronrons, thanks for the beautiful "then and now" picture. Not too much has changed in 115 years! Thanks also for identifying this cloister as part of the S. Stefano Basilica complex. We'll add that to the caption and our database.
Deb Wythe,
Digital Lab

comment.author: 31007231@N04
comment._content: Thanks to you ! (a specification: this is the Cloister of the S. Stefano Basilica complex - Celestines is another Church : Chiesa di San Giovanni Battista dei Celestini certosa.cineca.it/chiostro/luoghi.php?ID=1324

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hmm. Curiouser and curiouser. Wasn't the original confusion over S. Giovanni, Bologna? Are you sure this cloister isn't in that church, not S. Stefano?
Deb Wythe

comment.author: 31007231@N04
comment._content:
anch'io sono curiosa, adesso!  farò altre ricerche .... : in effetti anche questa fotografia può sembrare quella del Chiostro di Santo Stefano !  
Non so se nella chiesa dei Celestini, in una parte non aperta al pubblico, esiste un chiostro del 1400/1500 - l'aspetto attuale della Chiesa è quello del 1700: andrò a verificare ... di persona  :))
-----
I'm also curious, now! I will do more research .... : In fact, even this picture may seem the cloister of Santo Stefano!
I do not know if in the Church of Celestines, in a place not open to the public, there is a cloister of 1400/1500 - the current appearance of the Church is that of 1700: I'm going to check ... in person     :))
